mean_cn: n. 税（款），负担；  v. 对……征税，使负重担
mean_en: an amount of money that a government requires people to pay according to their income, the value of their property, etc., and that is used to pay for the things done by the government
sentence: We have to pay a tax on all of our sales.
sentence_trans: 我们必须全额上缴营业税。
